relation: Great for these types of students
if you are laid back, neat and tighty, partier, nose in the books kind of kid, gay, straight, lesbian, bisexual, transgendered, and well outspoken or shy DSC is for you.

Dalton State is a great college. you will have a great learning experience as well as fun with the student life center. the teachers are friendly and eager to help you better in your work. dsc also offers free tutoring and counseling for students with academic help or personal as well as career wise. If you are looking for a college with a great student abbraod opportunity and a great educational foundation to head start your future field of study than DSC is for you.
DSC has a great student center. you can play video games or pool or pong. they also have traveling opportunities if that may interest you.

the cafeteria in Dalton state is a bit expensive, but they came up just recently with some affordable meals. although, it is better to bring your own meal because one can save money and it wont get costly over time.

Don't be afraid to go to the student center and ask for help. stay on top on financial aid because they are overloaded with students that a call wont hurt. failing and dropping to many classes can hurt you with financial aid and you can be put on academic probation.

DSC has great programs attend and the teachers there are wonderful and ready to help when asked. DSC has a great foundation for students who plan to further their education. DSC has a great student activity center for students to enjoy and connect more with the school.

textAfterTable: Categories Comments Campus Safety everywhere any one goes at dalton state college you will see a school police man or woman. of course, you can find an emergency phone in various locations if something goes wrong or if for some reason the elevator gets stuck. for the most part its a quiet school so no one would really expect much harm to happen at the college. Greek Life at my school since it is still barely progressing as a four year institution it doest not have and greek life. so i really would not know how that is but i am sure that the girls and guys are very competitive of his or her groups. sisterhood or brotherhood, i can imagine the responsibilities it comes with being faithful to the group and honesty. Clubs and Activities in our college my first year we had latin dance club organized by hispanics, which was quite interesting because it was nice seeing something then traditional at school. unfortunately, after its first year it did not become successful as it was expected to do and it no longer exists. i was never able to attend it because my classes and the hour meetings never worked out well together but my friends did tell me it
